channel.title: Evolutionscape's *SUp3r* Client Development
channel.description:
Come check out [url=http://Evolutionscape.smfforfree2.com]Evolutionscape.smfforfree2.com[/url] or: [url=http://Evolutionscape.obxhost.net]Evolutionscape.obxhost.net[/url] for more on server development!
i added 89 godwars objects to client, 76 re-made items, 176 jagex items, 14 of my custom items, renamed shit, built quests from server, (dialouge sucks ass tho) and added 15 new gfx, 93 new NPC's, and 7 of my *custom* NPC's :P
Foxscape source owns, i was able to add all that stuff because for everything you add, you dont have to type in ::add model It does it for you on startup in like 5 secs, lol, and fox i can help with v5.5 lol, for now heres some pics on what I have done, lol the godwar objects i could fit 24 of em in falador and i got a crappy screen shot but here you go check it out :P
Heres Login [IMG]http://i58.photobucket.com/albums/g272/momman94/evolved0004.png[/img]
Same, its login [IMG]http://i58.photobucket.com/albums/g272/momman94/evolved0005.png[/img]
Black demon from godwars (just a small version of him) [IMG]http://i58.photobucket.com/albums/g272/momman94/evolved0006.png[/img]
Crappy pic of 10 out of 89 Godwar objects i made today, and added to client :P [IMG]http://i58.photobucket.com/albums/g272/momman94/evolved0004-1.png[/img]
Godwars dungeon portal, With quest requirements [IMG]http://i58.photobucket.com/albums/g272/momman94/questrequire.jpg[/img]
Cant give too many more pics lol, I want you guys too be shocked on release, on how many damn Super shit there is lol!!! but ya, still fox, what do you think? I mean my screen shots sucked but Still, like 350+ new NPC's, Items, Objects, and GFX's?? I do hope you like, because that was only part of my models im adding :P So fox, if you'd like, I'll help out with modeling, I'm really good at finding/ adding models Heres 1 last pic, a farewell pic [IMG]http://i58.photobucket.com/albums/g272/momman94/evolved0008.png[/img]
See look at my work lol, and i only got 11 rep :(

item.title: Evolutionscape's *SUp3r* Client Development
item.dc:creator: @veikron veikron
item.description:
@veikron wrote:

Looks like a cool server. Wrong topic though. Should have put in server advertisement. This is going to get locked or deleted probably.

Read full topic

See look at my work lol, and i [b]only got 11 rep[/b] :(
Droppin' hints there eh? EDIT: Nice work on the demon and objects xD

item.title: Evolutionscape's *SUp3r* Client Development
item.dc:creator: @Knight20202 Knight20202
item.description:
@Knight20202 wrote:

Come check out Evolutionscape.smfforfree2.com
or: Evolutionscape.obxhost.net
for more on server development!

i added 89 godwars objects to client, 76 re-made items, 176 jagex items, 14 of my custom items, renamed shit, built quests from server, (dialouge sucks ass tho) and added 15 new gfx, 93 new NPC’s, and 7 of my custom NPC’s

Foxscape source owns, i was able to add all that stuff because for everything you add, you dont have to type in ::add model It does it for you on startup in like 5 secs, lol, and fox i can help with v5.5 lol, for now heres some pics on what I have done, lol the godwar objects i could fit 24 of em in falador and i got a crappy screen shot but here you go check it out

Heres Login

evolved0004.png765×503

Same, its login

evolved0005.png765×503

Black demon from godwars (just a small version of him)

evolved0006.png765×503

Crappy pic of 10 out of 89 Godwar objects i made today, and added to client

evolved0004-1.png765×503

Godwars dungeon portal, With quest requirements

questrequire.jpg767×502

Cant give too many more pics lol, I want you guys too be shocked on release, on how many damn Super shit there is lol!!! but ya, still fox, what do you think? I mean my screen shots sucked but Still, like 350+ new NPC’s, Items, Objects, and GFX’s?? I do hope you like, because that was only part of my models im adding
So fox, if you’d like, I’ll help out with modeling, I’m really good at finding/ adding models Heres 1 last pic, a farewell pic

evolved0008.png765×503

See look at my work lol, and i only got 11 rep
